description: A React component named Chat that manages message state, handles user input, and communicates with an echo API to facilitate a chat interface with an echo bot.

methods.name: Chat()
methods.description: React functional component that manages message state, handles message sending, and renders chat UI.

methods.name: handleSend
methods.description: Asynchronous callback function invoked when user sends a message; updates message list with user message, calls sendEcho API, and appends bot response or error message.
